author: Rumi
message: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
title: Thought of the day

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
message: Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: With realization of ones own potential and self-confidence in ones ability, one can build a better world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Franklin Roosevelt
message: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
title: Thought of the day
